text: Demetri Martin (born May 25, 1973) is a Greek-American comedian, actor, artist, musician, writer and humorist. He was born in New York City and grew up in Toms River, New Jersey. Martin is best known for his work as a stand-up comedian, providing the voice of Ice Bear on the Cartoon Network series We Bare Bears, and as a contributor on The Daily Show. He hosted his own show on Comedy Central called Important Things with Demetri Martin. == Other websites == * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from New York City Category:Comedians from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American television actors Category:American television personalities Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:Comedy Central personalities Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Writers from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City
title: Demetri Martin
